channel.title: Rate My Range/Mage Pure with pics
channel.description:
[b]Name[/b]--[s]Rangers Nub[/s]
[b]Skill[/b]--Now--[i]Goal[/i]
[b]Range[/b]--50--[i]70[/i] [b]Now on hiscores![/b]
[b]Magic[/b]--33--[i]60[/i]
[b]Hitpoints[/b]--40--[i]No Goal[/i]
[b]Woodcutting[/b]--49--[i]70[/i]
[b]Firemaking[/b]--55--[i]99[/i] [b]Now on hiscores![/b]
[b]Cooking[/b]--36--[i]Just to be on hiscores[/i]
[b]Fishing[/b]--31--[i]Just to be on hiscores, and get food for training.[/i]
[b]Combat[/b]--34--[i]No Goal[/i]
[b]My Equipment: (I have camo top and hat, and lederhosen top and bottom, so these are old now...)[/b] [URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img215.imageshack.us/img215/2677/rsinventoryor4.png[/img][/URL]
[URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img133.imageshack.us/img133/7339/rsinventoryde0.png[/img][/URL] [b]My Goal Equipment: (I might not have the mime mask tho :()[/b] [URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img339.imageshack.us/img339/7982/rsgoalinventorydt6.png[/img][/URL]

item.title: Rate My Range/Mage Pure with pics
item.dc:creator: @ninjasod ninjasod
item.description:
@ninjasod wrote:

Whiteyboy5:

Not bad, nice firemaking Btw :eek:, Don’t quite see why its needed?

Easy skill cape when I’m member, so is cooking. I’d like a trimmed one

Ancient weed:

umm.one question how do you make the pictures that big when your upload a pic fomr imageshack which link do you copy??

Scroll down and you’ll see something like hotlink to forums or something close to that, click the first one.

I just got lederhosen bottoms :)[br][size=1]Posted on: March 26, 2007, 06:03:42 PM[/size][hr]Now here’s what random event items I got–
Camo top and helmet.
Lederhosen bottoms and top.
Frog mask.

Standing at varrock fountain all day gets you alot of randoms :|[br][size=1]Posted on: April 19th, 2007, 09:26:16 PM[/size][hr]Updated after a couple weeks
~April 19th (My birthday woot :))~

Read full topic

item.description:
@ninjasod wrote:

Ancient weed:

999 X-bow’s…look’s pretty fishy BUT im no saying it fake so dont acuse me acusing you that thats a fake pic

It’s a fake pic. If I really had an account like that, why would I be training this one?

item.title: Rate My Range/Mage Pure with pics
item.dc:creator: @ninjasod ninjasod
item.description:
@ninjasod wrote:

[quote=“I Am A God, post:7, topic:68389”]Very nice pure

Just get mage range and mage 85 and u own at wild like a hell ;D[/quote]
I’m eventually going to try to get them to 99, but those are just the milestones really

Updated
But the stats are still pretty low, I’m hoping to get around 38-40 range today, and maybe 32-35 magic.
Right now I’m at world 16 air running for $$$ :)[br][size=1]Posted on: March 23, 2007, 09:33:30 AM[/size][hr]Woot got my D’hide Chaps (g)!!!

item.title: Rate My Range/Mage Pure with pics
item.dc:creator: @ninjasod ninjasod
item.description:
@ninjasod wrote:

allserversuck:

incase you havent done st.hold yet its very easy just bring trout+. also you dont seem very rich… but im not one to talk!

What’s the point of buying anything expensive for this account when I can just spend it all on my main =
But I do plan to buy the stuff in the pictures, except karils bolt racks get expensive, so I’ll probably use magic shortbow and steel arrows, which are pretty good for training.

devull:

lol why not air run you get 2.5k per run every hour you can do 100 runs so thats 250k p.h so no point in merchanting feathers.

It would take alot of running to get 100 in an hour. I’ve done it maybe 30 mins and I’ve probably done like 20-25 runs…

Read full topic
